metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3078 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 5.16-rc6. There is a lack of check after calling vzalloc() and lack of free after allocation in drivers/media/test-drivers/vidtv/vidtv_s302m.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3078` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1020-azure - 5.19.0-1020.21~22.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-5.19.0-28-generic - 5.19.0-28.29~22.04.1
linux-image-5.19.0-28-generic-lpae - 5.19.0-28.29~22.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-28-generic - 5.19.0-28.29~22.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-28-generic-64k - 5.19.0-28.29~22.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1017-lowlatency - 5.19.0-1017.18~22.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1017-lowlatency-64k - 5.19.0-1017.18~22.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.0.0-1006-oem - 6.0.0-1006.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.1.0-1004-oem - 6.1.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-5.19.0-28-generic - 5.19.0-28.29~22.04.1
linux-image-5.19.0-28-generic-lpae - 5.19.0-28.29~22.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-28-generic - 5.19.0-28.29~22.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-28-generic-64k - 5.19.0-28.29~22.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1017-lowlatency - 5.19.0-1017.18~22.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1017-lowlatency-64k - 5.19.0-1017.18~22.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.0.0-1006-oem - 6.0.0-1006.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.1.0-1004-oem - 6.1.0-1004.4
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> vulnerability is in the virtual DVB test driver, enabled via CONFIG_DVB_VIDTV and CONFIG_DVB_TEST_DRIVERS, neither of which are enabled in ubuntu kernel configs.

criterions.comment: linux-azure-5.19 package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.19.0-1020.21~22.04.1').
